title: OCE: MCom Esports Platinum Team Recruitment

embed.description: Apply to become apart of team MCom. We are looking for dedicated, vocal and open-minded players, who are between the ranks of platinum 4 and platinum 1. The successful applicants will take part in weekly training in the form of five man flex, in-house scrims, and org vs org scrims to improve overall performance in preparation for amateur tounaments.

body:
Apply to become apart of team MCom. We are looking for dedicated, vocal and open-minded players, who are between the ranks of platinum 4 and platinum 1. 

The successful applicants will take part in weekly training in the form of five man flex, in-house scrims, and org vs org scrims to improve overall performance in preparation for amateur tounaments. The tournaments successful platinum MCom team applicants will participate in are hosted by SumSoc, TMG, BSV and Eskamos.

Fill the Google form doc to the best of your abilities as it may determine your position for the team.
